entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
